src:
Ganjar Pranowo Pamer Tempat Wisata Klaten, Netizen Tak Mau Kalah
07 Nov 2019, 20:59 by Syanti Mustika


Ganjar Pranowo membanggakan tempat wisata Umbul Ponggok di Klaten. (Foto: Rinto Heksantoro/detikcom)

Jakarta - Di akun Twitter-nya, Gubernur Jawa Tengah Ganjar Pranowo dengan bangga memamerkan destinasi wisata Umbul Ponggok di Klaten. Netizen pun tak mau kalah memamerkan tempat wisata mereka. Beberapa waktu lalu, media China dan Inggris memuji keindahan dari Umbul Ponggok di Klaten. Mereka terpukau dengan keindahan kolam jernih tempat wisata yang instagramable ini, serta pengaruh ekonomi yang dihadirkannya.


Umbul Ponggok di Klaten. (Foto: Bayu Ardi Isnanto/detikcom)

Sebagai gubernur di Jawa Tengah, Ganjar Pranowo tentu ikut bangga dengan destinasi wisata di wilayahnya dibahas positif oleh media internasional. Dalam Twitter-nya, yang diintip detikcom Kamis (7/11/2019), dia pun memamerkan sebuah artikel berita tentang Umbul Ponggok.

[Gambas:Twitter]

Dalam cuitannya Ganjar Pranowo juga minta netizen ikut memamerkan tempat wisatanya di daerah masing-masing. Netizen langsung menyambut dengan memamerkan destinasi wisata di tempat mereka, lengkap dengan foto."Ke Bintan pak Kepulauan Riau, empangnya gede banget ini pak..!! ((Empang))" tulis akun @Wan_smile86. Hal yang sama juga dilakukan akun @saimima yang memamerkan keindahan pasir putih di Maluku.Tak ketinggalan akun @Theking3231Juan yang langsung memposting keindahan Danau Toba. Juga akun @samuelherlam memamerkan fotonya saaat berada di Gunung Merbabu.Puluhan netizen pun merespon dan tak mau kalah dari Gubernur jawa Tengah ini. Ada lagi yang pamer keindahan Bali, Temanggung, Wae Rebo, PAntai Barat Bambarano Sulawesi, Kota Tua Semarang dan masih banyak lainnya. Bahkan ada netizen yang pamer JPO yang akan jadi spot selfie di Jakarta.Hingga saat ini cuitan Ganjar sudah sukai oleh 720 netizen dengan 142 retweet.Traveler mau ikutan pamer?Simak Video "Dipuji Media Internasional, Ini Keindahan Umbul Ponggok"[Gambas:Video 20detik](sym/krs)
text:
Ganjar Pranowo Showing off Klaten Tourist Attraction, Netizens Don't Want to Lose
Nov 7 2019, 20:59 by Syanti Mustika


Ganjar Pranowo boasts of Umbul Ponggok tourist attractions in Klaten. (Photo: Rinto Heksantoro / detikcom)

Jakarta - On his Twitter account, Central Java Governor Ganjar Pranowo proudly showed off the Umbul Ponggok tourist destination in Klaten. Netizens also do not want to lose showing off their tourist attractions. Some time ago, Chinese and British media praised the beauty of the Umbul Ponggok in Klaten. They were fascinated by the beauty of the crystal clear pool of this instagramable tourist spot, as well as the economic influence it presents.


Umbul Ponggok in Klaten. (Photo: Bayu Ardi Isnanto / detikcom)

As governor in Central Java, Ganjar Pranowo is certainly proud of the tourist destinations in his region which were discussed positively by international media. On his Twitter, peeked on Thursday (11/07/2019), he also showed a news article about Umbul Ponggok.

[Gambas: Twitter]

In his tweet, Ganjar Pranowo also asked netizens to exhibit their tourist attractions in their respective regions. Netizens immediately welcomed by displaying tourist destinations in their places, complete with photos. The same thing is also done @saimima account which showcases the beauty of white sand in Maluku. Don't miss the account @ Theking3231Juan who immediately posted the beauty of Lake Toba. Also @samuelherlam account exhibited his photo when he was at Mount Merbabu. Dozens of netizens also responded and did not want to lose from the Governor of Central Java. There are more who show off the beauty of Bali, Temanggung, Wae Rebo, West Coast of Bambarano Sulawesi, Kota Tua Semarang and many others. There are even netizens who show off JPO who will be selfies in Jakarta. Until now, Ganjar's cuit has been liked by 720 netizens with 142 retweets. ] (sym / krs)
